summary: This is a forwarded email from August 10, 2019, discussing Jeffrey Epstein's release from a facility on July 30, 2019, and noting a lengthy attorney visit that day. The sender mentions an intention to send an attorney log.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; his release from a facility on July 30, 2019, and a lengthy attorney visit on that day are discussed.

events.title: Epstein's Release and Attorney Visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was released from a facility. He had an attorney visit starting at 8:20am that lasted all day.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was released from a facility on July 30, 2019.
On the day of his release, Epstein had an attorney visit that began at 8:20am and lasted all day.
The email, dated August 10, 2019, references a 'Psych Ops log book' as the source of this information.
The sender indicates an intention to send an attorney log in a subsequent communication.
